page.title: 03BIOGRAPHY
page.content: The main occupations of residents in our area are farming and market gardening. Some residents obviously live in the area as it is convenient for their work. The minority of residents have jobs in farms or are, perhaps, railway workers in nearby towns and they wanted to live in a quiet, unspoilt area close to their place of work. The average number of years that residents have lived in the same area is just over 38 years, though this does not apply to all residents. The majority of occupants are married, but only about half the residents asked had children. Residents enjoy the surrounding unspoilt countryside and the company of friendly inhabitants.
